title: Area code for Grenada, Carriacou and Petite Martinique
description: Area code  473 is the local telephone area code of Grenada, Carriacou and Petite Martinique. The  473 area code, which spells GRE, was created during a split from the original  809 area code which began permissive dialing on  31 October  1997 and ended  31 October  1998.
notes: The  473 area code has been linked to a form of telephone fraud known as the 'one ring scam'.
When the victim does this, an automatic $19.95 international call fee is charged to their account, as well as $9.00/min thereafter.
